display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: Apneas with >=3% oxygen desaturation or with arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >=3% oxygen desaturation or with arousal / hour of sleep from type II polysomnography
description: Calculated - Summary metric of sleep disordered breathing events
calculation: 60 * ( hremba3 + hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 + carba3 + caroa3 + canba3 + canoa3 + oarba3 + oaroa3 + oanba3 + oanoa3 ) / slpprdp
